mil6.1.5:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, mahantam idam tathagatasasanam saram varam settham pavaram anupamam parisuddham vimalam pandaram anavajjam, na yuttam gihim tavatakam pabbajetum, gihiyeva ekasmim phale vinetva yada apunaravatti hoti tada so pabbajetabbo.
mil6.1.5:1.3: Ime dujjana tava tattha sasane visuddhe pabbajitva patinivattitva hinayavattanti, tesam paccagamanena ayam mahajano evam vicinteti ‘tucchakam vata bho etam samanassa gotamassa sasanam bhavissati, yam ime patinivattanti’ti, idamettha karanan”ti.
mil6.1.5:2.1: “Yatha, maharaja, talako bhaveyya sampunnasucivimalasitalasalilo, atha yo koci kilittho malakaddamagato tam talakam gantva anahayitva kilitthova patinivatteyya, tattha, maharaja, katamam jano garaheyya kilittham va talakam va”ti?
mil6.1.5:2.2: “Kilittham, bhante, jano garaheyya ‘ayam talakam gantva anahayitva kilitthova patinivatto, kim imam anahayitukamam talako sayam nahapessati, ko doso talakassa’”ti.
mil6.1.5:2.3: “Evameva kho, maharaja, tathagato vimuttivarasalilasampunnam saddhammavaratalakam mapesi ‘ye keci kilesamalakilittha sacetana budha, te idha nahayitva sabbakilese pavahayissanti’ti.
mil6.1.5:2.4: Yadi koci tam saddhammavaratalakam gantva anahayitva sakilesova patinivattitva hinayavattati tamyeva jano garahissati ‘ayam jinasasane pabbajitva tattha patittham alabhitva hinayavatto, kim imam appatipajjantam jinasasanam sayam bodhessati, ko doso jinasasanassa’ti?
mil6.1.5:3.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, puriso paramabyadhito roguppattikusalam amoghadhuvasiddhakammam bhisakkam sallakattam disva atikicchapetva sabyadhikova patinivatteyya, tattha katamam jano garaheyya aturam va bhisakkam va”ti?
mil6.1.5:3.2: “Aturam, bhante, jano garaheyya ‘ayam roguppattikusalam amoghadhuvasiddhakammam bhisakkam sallakattam disva atikicchapetva sabyadhikova patinivatto, kim imam atikicchapentam bhisakko sayam tikicchissati, ko doso bhisakkassa’”ti?
mil6.1.5:3.3: “Evameva kho, maharaja, tathagato antosasanasamugge kevalam sakalakilesabyadhivupasamanasamattham amatosadham pakkhipi, ‘ye keci kilesabyadhipilita sacetana budha, te imam amatosadham pivitva sabbakilesabyadhim vupasamessanti’ti.
mil6.1.5:3.4: Yadi koci tam amatosadham apivitva sakilesova patinivattitva hinayavattati, tamyeva jano garahissati ‘ayam jinasasane pabbajitva tattha patittham alabhitva hinayavatto, kim imam appatipajjantam jinasasanam sayam bodhessati, ko doso jinasasanassa’ti?
mil6.1.5:4.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, chato puriso mahatimahapunnabhattaparivesanam gantva tam bhattam abhunjitva chatova patinivatteyya, tattha katamam jano garaheyya chatam va punnabhattam va”ti?
mil6.1.5:4.2: “Chatam, bhante, jano garaheyya ‘ayam khudapilito punnabhattam patilabhitva abhunjitva chatova patinivatto, kim imassa abhunjantassa bhojanam sayam mukham pavisissati, ko doso bhojanassa’”ti?
mil6.1.5:4.3: “Evameva kho, maharaja, tathagato antosasanasamugge paramapavaram santam sivam panitam amatam paramamadhuram kayagatasatibhojanam thapesi ‘ye keci kilesachatajjhatta tanhaparetamanasa sacetana budha, te imam bhojanam bhunjitva kamaruparupabhavesu sabbam tanhamapanessanti’ti.
mil6.1.5:4.4: Yadi koci tam bhojanam abhunjitva tanhasitova patinivattitva hinayavattati, tanneva jano garahissati ‘ayam jinasasane pabbajitva tattha patittham alabhitva hinayavatto, kim imam appatipajjantam jinasasanam sayam bodhessasi, ko doso jinasasanassa’ti?
mil6.1.5:5.1: Yadi, maharaja, tathagato gihimyeva ekasmim phale vinitam pabbajeyya, na namayam pabbajja kilesappahanaya visuddhiya va, natthi pabbajjaya karaniyam.
mil6.1.5:5.2: Yatha, maharaja, puriso anekasatena kammena talakam khanapetva parisaya evamanussaveyya ‘ma me, bhonto, keci sankilittha imam talakam otaratha, pavahitarajojalla parisuddha vimalamattha imam talakam otaratha’ti.
mil6.1.5:5.3: Api nu kho, maharaja, tesam pavahitarajojallanam parisuddhanam vimalamatthanam tena talakena karaniyam bhaveyya”ti?
mil6.1.5:5.4: “Na hi, bhante, yassatthaya te tam talakam upagaccheyyum, tam annatreva tesam katam karaniyam, kim tesam tena talakena”ti?
mil6.1.5:5.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, yadi tathagato gihimyeva ekasmim phale vinitam pabbajeyya, tattheva tesam katam karaniyam, kim tesam pabbajjaya.
mil6.1.5:6.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, sabhavaisibhattiko sutamantapadadharo atakkiko roguppattikusalo amoghadhuvasiddhakammo bhisakko sallakatto sabbarogupasamabhesajjam sannipatetva parisaya evamanussaveyya ‘ma kho, bhonto, keci sabyadhika mama santike upagacchatha, abyadhika aroga mama santike upagacchatha’ti.
mil6.1.5:6.2: Api nu kho, maharaja, tesam abyadhikanam aroganam paripunnanam udagganam tena bhisakkena karaniyam bhaveyya”ti?
mil6.1.5:6.3: “Na hi, bhante, yassatthaya te tam bhisakkam sallakattam upagaccheyyum, tam annatreva tesam katam karaniyam, kim tesam tena bhisakkena”ti?
mil6.1.5:6.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, yadi tathagato gihimyeva ekasmim phale vinitam pabbajeyya, tattheva tesam katam karaniyam, kim tesam pabbajjaya?
mil6.1.5:7.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, koci puriso anekathalipakasatam bhojanam patiyadapetva parisaya evamanussaveyya ‘ma me, bhonto, keci chata imam parivesanam upagacchatha, subhutta titta suhita dhata pinita paripunna imam parivesanam upagacchatha’ti.
mil6.1.5:7.2: Api nu kho, maharaja, tesam bhuttavinam tittanam suhitanam dhatanam pinitanam paripunnanam tena bhojanena karaniyam bhaveyya”ti?
mil6.1.5:7.3: “Na hi, bhante, yassatthaya te tam parivesanam upagaccheyyum, tam annatreva tesam katam karaniyam, kim tesam taya parivesanaya”ti?
mil6.1.5:7.4: “Evameva kho, maharaja, yadi tathagato gihimyeva ekasmim phale vinitam pabbajeyya, tattheva tesam katam karaniyam, kim tesam pabbajjaya?
mil6.1.5:8.1: Api ca, maharaja, ye hinayavattanti, te jinasasanassa panca atuliye gune dassenti.
mil6.1.5:8.3: Bhumimahantabhavam dassenti, parisuddhavimalabhavam dassenti, papehi asamvasiyabhavam dassenti, duppativedhabhavam dassenti, bahusamvararakkhiyabhavam dassenti.
mil6.1.5:9.2: Yatha, maharaja, puriso adhano hinajacco nibbiseso buddhiparihino maharajjam patilabhitva na cirasseva paripatati paridhamsati parihayati yasato, na sakkoti issariyam sandharetum.
mil6.1.5:9.5: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye keci nibbisesa akatapunna buddhiparihina jinasasane pabbajanti, te tam pabbajjam pavaruttamam sandharetum avisahanta na cirasseva jinasasana paripatitva paridhamsitva parihayitva hinayavattanti, na sakkonti jinasasanam sandharetum.
mil6.1.5:10.2: Yatha, maharaja, vari pokkharapatte vikirati vidhamati vidhamseti, na thanamupagacchati nupalimpati.
mil6.1.5:10.5: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye keci satha kuta vanka kutila visamaditthino jinasasane pabbajanti, te parisuddhavimalanikkantakapandaravarappavarasasanato na cirasseva vikiritva vidhamitva vidhamsetva asanthahitva anupalimpitva hinayavattanti.
mil6.1.5:11.2: Yatha, maharaja, mahasamuddo na matena kunapena samvasati, yam hoti mahasamudde matam kunapam, tam khippameva tiram upaneti thalam va ussareti.
mil6.1.5:11.5: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye keci papaka asamvuta ahirika akiriya osannaviriya kusita kilittha dujjana manussa jinasasane pabbajanti, te na cirasseva jinasasanato arahantavimalakhinasavamahabhutabhavanato nikkhamitva asamvasitva hinayavattanti.
mil6.1.5:12.2: Yatha, maharaja, ye keci acheka asikkhita asippino mativippahina issasa valaggavedham avisahanta vigalanti pakkamanti.
mil6.1.5:12.5: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye keci duppanna jala elamuga mulha dandhagatika jana jinasasane pabbajanti, te tam paramasanhasukhumacatusaccappativedham pativijjhitum avisahanta jinasasana vigalitva pakkamitva na cirasseva hinayavattanti.
mil6.1.5:13.2: Yatha, maharaja, kocideva puriso mahatimahayuddhabhumimupagato parasenaya disavidisahi samanta parivarito sattihattham janamupentam disva bhito osakkati patinivattati palayati.
mil6.1.5:13.5: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye keci papaka asamvuta ahirika akiriya akkhanti capala calita ittara balajana jinasasane pabbajanti, te bahuvidham sikkhapadam parirakkhitum avisahanta osakkitva patinivattitva palayitva na cirasseva hinayavattanti.
mil6.1.5:14.1: Thalajuttamepi, maharaja, vassikagumbe kimividdhani pupphani honti, tani ankurani sankutitani antarayeva paripatanti, na ca tesu paripatitesu vassikagumbo hilito nama hoti.
mil6.1.5:14.2: Yani tattha thitani pupphani, tani samma gandhena disavidisam abhibyapenti.
mil6.1.5:14.3: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye te jinasasane pabbajitva hinayavattanti, te jinasasane kimividdhani vassikapupphani viya vannagandharahita nibbannakarasila abhabba vepullaya, na ca tesam hinayavattanena jinasasanam hilitam nama hoti.
mil6.1.5:14.4: Ye tattha thita bhikkhu, te sadevakam lokam silavaragandhena abhibyapenti.
mil6.1.5:15.1: Salinampi, maharaja, niratankanam lohitakanam antare karumbhakam nama salijati uppajjitva antara yeva vinassati, na ca tassa vinatthatta lohitakasali hilita nama honti.
mil6.1.5:15.2: Ye tattha thita sali, te rajupabhoga honti.
mil6.1.5:15.3: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye te jinasasane pabbajitva hinayavattanti, te lohitakasalinamantare karumbhaka viya jinasasane na vaddhitva vepullatam na papunitva antarayeva hinayavattanti, na ca tesam hinayavattanena jinasasanam hilitam nama hoti.
mil6.1.5:15.4: Ye tattha thita bhikkhu te arahattassa anucchavika honti.
mil6.1.5:16.1: Kamadadassapi, maharaja, maniratanassa ekadesam kakkasam uppajjati, na ca tattha kakkasuppannatta maniratanam hilitam nama hoti.
mil6.1.5:16.2: Yam tattha parisuddham maniratanassa, tam janassa hasakaram hoti.
mil6.1.5:16.3: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye te jinasasane pabbajitva hinayavattanti, kakkasa te jinasasane papatika, na ca tesam hinayavattanena jinasasanam hilitam nama hoti.
mil6.1.5:16.4: Ye tattha thita bhikkhu, te devamanussanam hasajanaka honti.
mil6.1.5:17.1: Jatisampannassapi, maharaja, lohitacandanassa ekadesam putikam hoti appagandham.
mil6.1.5:17.2: Na tena lohitacandanam hilitam nama hoti.
mil6.1.5:17.3: Yam tattha aputikam sugandham, tam samanta vidhupeti abhibyapeti.
mil6.1.5:17.4: Evameva kho, maharaja, ye te jinasasane pabbajitva hinayavattanti, te lohitacandanasarantare putikadesamiva chaddaniya jinasasane, na ca tesam hinayavattanena jinasasanam hilitam nama hoti.
mil6.1.5:17.5: Ye tattha thita bhikkhu, te sadevakam lokam silavaracandanagandhena anulimpayanti”ti.
mil6.1.5:18.1: “Sadhu, bhante nagasena, tena tena anucchavikena tena tena sadisena karanena niravajjamanupapitam jinasasanam setthabhavena paridipitam, hinayavattamanapi te jinasasanassa setthabhavamyeva paridipenti”ti.
